c74object.name: hoa.2d.recomposer
c74object.digest: A Graphical User Interface to manipulate channels in 2d.
c74object.description: hoa.2d.recomposer helps you to set angle and widening value of channels to warp the sound field. It is mainly dedicated to the control of the hoa.2d.recomposer~ processor object.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

method.name: (mouse)
method.digest: Click and drag to change angles and widening values of the channels.
method.description:
Click and drag the channel points select them and to set their angles and widening values.
drag to move selected channels angles
shift+drag to change selected channels' widening value
cmd+a to select All (ctrl+a for win)
cmd+drag to do a rectangular selection (ctrl+drag for win)
cmd+click on a channel to change this channel selection state (cmd+click for win)
ctrl+move to have a preview of the fisheye effect (alt+move for win).
ctrl+click lock fisheye start and destination angles value for the selected channels (alt+click for win).
ctrl+drag apply a "fisheye effect" to the selected channels (drag from/to fisheye point from/to center of the circle) (alt+drag for win)
double-click on a channel to set it to the closest default channel angle.
Press cmd key when you drag to activate magnetism on the currently dragged channel

method.name: angles
method.digest: Set angle value for one or more channels and trigger output.
method.description: The word angles followed by an index and a float set a specific channel angle. The word angles followed by a list of float set several channel angles.

method.name: bang
method.description: The bang message report current values.

method.name: reset
method.digest: Reset angle and widening value of one or more channels and trigger output.
method.description: Without argument, the word reset will reset all of the angles and widening values of channels to default. The word reset followed by the symbol wide will reset all widening value to 1. To reset specific channels widening values pass their index as a list of int as second argument. The word reset followed by the symbol angle will reset all angles to default. To reset specific channels angles pass their index as a list of int as second argument.

method.name: set
method.digest: Set angle or widening value for one or more channels without output.
method.description: The word set followed by the symbol wide sets the widening value. The word set followed by the symbol angles sets angles values. Second argument is the index of the channel. Pass 0 if you want to set all of the channels. last argument is the value. angles are in radian, wrapped between 0. and 2Ï€. wide is clipped between 0. and 1.

method.name: wide
method.digest: Set widening value for one or more channels and trigger output.
method.description: The word wide followed by an index and a float set a specific channel widening value. Pass 0 to set all widening values. The word wide followed by a list of float set widening value for a list of channel.
